product.longDescription: Darker red and shinier than Skyphos and Red Cross. Alkindus performed well in our spring, summer, and fall trials. Smaller, more dense heads in the spring and larger, less dense heads in the summer. Utility Patent granted. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–26, 28, 32; US 5–9, Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid, and tomato bushy stunt virus (lettuce dieback complex); and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,100 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Uniform, reliable, attractive red butterhead. Organic seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

Alkindus Organic Pelleted Lettuce Seed

Product ID:3212GP.113212GP

Darker red and shinier than Skyphos and Red Cross. Alkindus performed well in our spring, summer, and fall trials. Smaller, more dense heads in the spring and larger, less dense heads in the summer. Utility Patent granted. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–26, 28, 32; US 5–9, Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid, and tomato bushy stunt virus (lettuce dieback complex); and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,100 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.
